Overwhelming Smash

Nicked an Artery

Normal damage. The target takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

Care your Initials

Normal damage. The target is so humiliated it can do nothing but attack you. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to end this effect.

Distraction

The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.
